summary: REQ-1 and REQ-2 appear implemented via local Tailwind class overrides in CalendarView (border-2 + border-border) without touching shared UI components. However, the diff also introduces additional visual changes (e.g., calendar shadow) and modifies non-requested metadata/summary files.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a drop shadow to the main calendar component (shadow-lg), which is beyond the requested border-only prominence change.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest asks to make borders slightly more prominent and explicitly avoids broader visual redesign; shadow is an extra visual enhancement not requested.
evidence: frontend/src/components/CalendarView.tsx (CalendarComponent className includes "... border-2 border-border shadow-lg")

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added detailed narrative summaries describing many unrelated UI and feature behaviors (e.g., PhotoComparisonView slots, analytics charts, DayDetailView changes).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is limited to border prominence for two specific elements in CalendarView; these summary updates describe unrelated changes and are not requested deliverables.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified project tracking state (project_state.json) setting up new_feature_requests entries unrelated to implementing the UI change itself.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not request changes to project metadata/state files; this is outside the specified frontend UI scope.
